name: WPC Smart Upsell Funnel for WooCommerce
author: WPClever

sections.description:
WPC Smart Upsell Funnel is the ultimate WooCommerce extension that delivers powerful product suggestions and irresistible order bump offers with attractive discounts to customers at checkout. This tool seamlessly presents customers with additional products at discounted rates without any disruption to their checkout process.

Features

  • Add unlimited rules with many conditions
  • Conditional: cart subtotal
  • Conditional: cart total
  • Conditional: cart count
  • Conditional: cart contains (selected products, products that have selected attributes, etc.)
  • Set new price by percentage or amount for upsell products
sections.installation:
1. Please make sure that you installed WooCommerce
  2. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select “Add New”
  3. Search for “WPC Smart Upsell Funnel”, Install & Activate it
  4. Go to WP-admin > Upsell Funnel to add rules

short_description: Suggest additional products and offer discounts to customers on the checkout page with flexible and smart conditions.
